pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Package for Fitting Multinomial Probit Models with Endogenous Selection // endogMNP is an R package that fits a Bayesian multinomial probit model with endogenous selection, which is sometimes called an endogenous switching model. This can be used to model discrete choice data when respondents select themselves into one of several groups. This package is based on the MNP package by Kosuke Imai and David A. van Dyk. This package modifies their code.
